Class Controller

    • bgpp2011.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      The controller must execute operations given by the user (as requested in the user interface).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        The controller must execute operations given by the user (as requested in the user interface). It must do all the checking and ordering.

    • Method Detail

      • checkReservation

        public boolean checkReservation(Reservation re)
        This method check if a reservation overlaps another reservation. It compares the dates of the reservation given in the parameter with the dates from all reservations in the HashMap reservations. It uses the String-types compare method to check if the dates are overlapping.

      • vehiclesByType

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> vehiclesByType(VehicleType v)
        This code returns an ArrayList of vehicles grouped by the type they belong to, which is specified in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        v - a the VehicleType which selects the vehicles
        Returns:
        ArrayList an ArrayList containing the vehicles grouped by type

      • typeCounting

        public int typeCounting(VehicleType v,
               java.sql.Date start,
               java.sql.Date end)
        This method is used when counting the number of vehicles avalaible in a certain date-range.
        Parameters:
        v - the VehicleType of which the vehicles should be counted
        start - the Date object containing information about the Start of the range
        end - the Date object containing information about the End of the date-range.
        Returns:
        int an Integer counting the number of free vehicles in the type.

      • vacantVehicles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> vacantVehicles(VehicleType v,
                                          java.sql.Date start,
                                          java.sql.Date end)
        This method is used to fetch an arraylist of vehicles containing vehicles which are free to rent in the specified daterange, grouped by type.
        Parameters:
        v - the VehicleType of which the vehicles should be selected.
        start - the Date object containing information about the Start of the range
        end - the Date object containing information about the End of the date-range.
        Returns:
        ArrayList a list containing the avalaible vehicles.

      • searchVehicles

        public Vehicle searchVehicles(VehicleType v,
                     java.sql.Date start,
                     java.sql.Date end)

      • createReservation

        public Reservation createReservation(Customer c,
                            VehicleType t,
                            java.sql.Date start,
                            java.sql.Date end)
        This method is called by the GUI and it checks if a reservation is avaliable, and return it if it is. Else it returns null.

      • createCustomer

        public Customer createCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                      int phonenumber,
                      java.lang.String address,
                      java.lang.String bankaccount)
        This method creates a new customer. It checks whether the customer is already in the system.

      • createVehicle

        public Vehicle createVehicle(java.lang.String make,
                    java.lang.String vmodel,
                    int year,
                    VehicleType v)
        Creates a new vehicle. It check if the type is correct and already in the system. It sends a vehicle to the database which deligates an id to it.

      • createVehicleType

        public boolean createVehicleType(java.lang.String name,
                        double price)
        Method that creates a new vehicletype. It sends a type to Nexus, witch deligates an id to it. It checks whether there is already a type with the same name in the system.

      • deleteReservation

        public boolean deleteReservation(Reservation r)

      • deleteCustomer

        public boolean deleteCustomer(Customer c)

      • deleteVehicle

        public boolean deleteVehicle(Vehicle v)

      • deleteVehicleType

        public boolean deleteVehicleType(VehicleType vt)

      • editReservation

        public boolean editReservation(Reservation newR,
                      Reservation oldR)
        This method takes a new reservation as a parameter and puts it in HashMap, with a key equal to the id of the reservation.

      • editVehicle

        public boolean editVehicle(Vehicle newV,
                  Vehicle oldV)

      • editVehicleType

      • editCustomer

        public boolean editCustomer(Customer newC,
                   Customer oldC)

      • getModel

        public Model getModel()
        Closes the connection to the database. Uses the close database method from the NexusClass.

      • close

        public void close()
